GenAiFunction.description:
Call Salesforce REST API endpoints with support for all HTTP methods.
USAGE GUIDELINES: Endpoint Construction: - Base URL automatically added - Version-specific endpoints (/v63.0/) - Composite resource support - SObject endpoints - Bulk API 2.0 endpoints - Connect API endpoints - UI API endpoints
Technical Details: - HTTP Methods: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE - Content-Type: application/json default - Authentication: Automatic session handling - Response formats: JSON/XML - Compression: Automatic handling - Batch size limits: Per endpoint - Rate limiting: Built-in handling - CORS compliance: Automatic - Error mapping: Standard format - Binary handling: Base64 encoding
